name: (BM) 2. Speaking: Job Interview Roleplay
questionContents: What questions should an interviewer ask during a job interview?
How can a candidate effectively respond to common interview questions?
What are some strategies for making a good impression in an interview?
What are common mistakes candidates make during interviews, and how can they be avoided?

name: (BM) 3. Writing: IT Job Advertisement
questionContents: Write a job advertisement for an IT job you would like or your current IT job. Use the pattern you identified in the previous exercise.
